Assessment Information

This website presents a comprehensive early childhood creativity curriculum framework across 10 curriculum areas for children aged 0-8 years.

Quick Links

  • ✓ 12 comprehensive pages
  • ✓ 500-word transcripts per page
  • ✓ Video enactments included
  • ✓ Critical reflection (200 words)
  • ✓ APA 7 references

Accessibility & Features

  • • Responsive mobile design
  • • Smooth GSAP animations
  • • Collapsible transcript sections
  • • Video accessibility features
  • • Academic citation format
